insert into t_workforceManagement ( id, companyid, cycle, username, day1, day2, day3, day4, day5, day6, day7, day8, day9, day10, day11, day12, day13, day14, day15, day16, day17, day18, day19, day20, day21, day22, day23, day24, day25, day26, day27, day28, day29, day30, day31, remark, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time ) values
( #{params.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{params.companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{params.cycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day15,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day16,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day17,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day18,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day19,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day20,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day21,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day22,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day23,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day24,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day25,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day26,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day27,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day28,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day29,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day30,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.day31,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{params.updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select:
SELECT a.*,tc.name as companyName FROM t_workforceManagement a LEFT JOIN t_company tc on a.companyid = tc.id LEFT JOIN v_cosmetologist vc on a.username = vc.nickname and vc.companyid=a.companyid where 1=1
and a.cycle like concat('%',#{cycle},'%')
and a.companyid=#{companyid}
order by vc.nickname desc

SELECT
tc.name as '门店名称', a.cycle as '排班周期', a.username as '员工姓名', a.day1 as '${record.day1}', a.day2 as '${record.day2}', a.day3 as '${record.day3}', a.day4 as '${record.day4}', a.day5 as '${record.day5}', a.day6 as '${record.day6}', a.day7 as '${record.day7}', a.day8 as '${record.day8}', a.day9 as '${record.day9}', a.day10 as '${record.day10}', a.day11 as '${record.day11}', a.day12 as '${record.day12}', a.day13 as '${record.day13}', a.day14 as '${record.day14}', a.day15 as '${record.day15}', a.day16 as '${record.day16}', a.day17 as '${record.day17}', a.day18 as '${record.day18}', a.day19 as '${record.day19}', a.day20 as '${record.day20}', a.day21 as '${record.day21}', a.day22 as '${record.day22}', a.day23 as '${record.day23}', a.day24 as '${record.day24}', a.day25 as '${record.day25}', a.day26 as '${record.day26}', a.day27 as '${record.day27}', a.day28 as '${record.day28}'
,a.day29 as '${record.day29}'
,a.day29 as '${record.day29}', a.day30 as '${record.day30}'
,a.day29 as '${record.day29}', a.day30 as '${record.day30}', a.day31 as '${record.day31}'
FROM t_workforceManagement a LEFT JOIN t_company tc on a.companyid = tc.id LEFT JOIN v_cosmetologist vc on a.username = vc.nickname and vc.companyid=a.companyid where 1=1
and a.cycle =${record.cycle}
and a.companyid=${record.companyid}
order by vc.nickname desc
